item.title: Can this nasal spray slow down Alzheimer's? One couple is helping scientists find out

item.title: Common gene variant doubles dementia risk for men, study suggests
item.description: New research has found that men who carry a common genetic variant are twice as likely to develop dementia in their lifetime compared to women.
